name: Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking Experimental (12-19)
description: Initial experimental 2.0 Flash variant (December 19, 2024) with extended thinking capabilities. Shows step-by-step reasoning process for stronger reasoning on complex problems.
notes: EXPERIMENTAL - Free via Google AI Studio and Vertex AI. Initial release December 19, 2024. Limited 32k context window (expanded to 1M in 01-21 update). Generates explicit thinking process before responding. Superseded by 01-21 version with enhanced capabilities. May have inconsistent performance.
